1326710.name: TIGER GAME ASSETS
1326710.description:
TIGER GAME ASSETS is a package that includes Pixel game assets.
Included files are PNG\HXL\ASE\PSD on their type.
The files are compatible with most game engines and work on on most system platform.

include
  • 8bit Pixel Tiles
  • 16bit Pixel Tiles
  • side-scrolling Game Tiles
  • isometric Tiles
  • top Down Tiles
  • hexagon Tiles
  • Game Sprites
  • UI Buttons
  • UI Font Styles

features
  • License - Use the Steam Package for your game, web, print, or other commercial development project. All assets are royalty free, no hidden costs.
  • Full Access - By purchasing，You may edit, manipulate, and change the graphics in any way for use with your game development，support the creation of new assets.
  • Includes vector source files
1326710.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
